title: Join us at the DataStax Accelerate Conference!
description:
Join us at DataStax Accelerate, the world's premiere Apache Cassandraâ„¢ conference. Choose from 70+ talks by Instagram, Netflix, and more. Attend the one day Accelerate Application Development Bootcamp to learn hands-on what it takes to build an app on Cassandra. Plus, the Cassandra certification exam is free at Accelerate ($375 value).

Gaylord National Resort & Convention Center, Maryland 
May 21-23, 2019

Use code ACADEMYSOCIAL20 for 20% off 
Visit Datastax.com/accelerate for more info!
